SEARCH
Package database

Interface iDatabase

All Known Implementing Classes:
CampDatabase, CampParticipantDatabase, Database, EnquiryDatabase, StaffDatabase, StudentDatabase, SuggestionDatabase, UserDatabase
public interface iDatabase
This interface defines the basic operations that a database class should implement. Implementing classes should provide concrete implementations for these methods.
Author:
weiya

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    add(Object o)
    Adds an item to the database.
    boolean
    delete(int id)
    Deletes an item from the database based on the provided ID.
    boolean
    editRow(int id, String column, Object newCellValue)
    Edits a specific column in a row of the database.
    Object
    getItem(int id)
    Retrieves an item from the database based on the provided ID.
    ArrayList
    getList()
    Retrieves a list of items from the database.

  • Method Details

    • getItem

      Object getItem(int id)
      Retrieves an item from the database based on the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the item to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The retrieved item.

    • getList

      ArrayList getList()
      Retrieves a list of items from the database.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the list of items retrieved from the database.

    • add

      boolean add(Object o)
      Adds an item to the database.
      Parameters:
      o - The item to be added to the database.
      Returns:
      true if the item is successfully added, false otherwise.

    • delete

      boolean delete(int id)
      Deletes an item from the database based on the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the item to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the item is successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • editRow

      boolean editRow(int id, String column, Object newCellValue)
      Edits a specific column in a row of the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the row to be edited.
      column - The name of the column to be edited.
      newCellValue - The new value to be set in the specified column.
      Returns:
      true if the column is successfully edited, false otherwise.
